name: Facility K
description:
Facility K is a challenging single-player platforming adventure following the story of three robots who awaken in a mysterious training facility with no idea what they are there for. As Bot-43, you'll face many perilous obstacles including pools of biochemical weapon, breakable terrain, lasers and crushers all combined together into challenging training courses. Together with your fellow robots Bot-44 and Bot-45, you'll uncover clues and eventually discover the reason for your existence there.

Features

  • 42 challenging platforming levels with a variety of obstacles
  • 4 chapters of gameplay
  • 5 additional dedicated story based levels
  • Text dialogue based narrative
  • Vibrant tile based 2D art style

System Requirements

Okay, I have no idea but this game could probably run on a microwave oven :)

Controls

Standard platformer controls: arrow keys or WASD. Press Esc to return to the main menu.
